sections.heading: Prohibitions6-1102.ProhibitionsA person shall not directly or indirectly take any action that causes or results in a company becoming a financial institution holding company, except with the approval of the deputy director pursuant to this article or as otherwise allowed by this article
sections.text: Prohibitions6-1102.ProhibitionsA person shall not directly or indirectly take any action that causes or results in a company becoming a financial institution holding company, except with the approval of the deputy director pursuant to this article or as otherwise allowed by this article.
